original_title: 坂本真綾 15周年記念LIVE“Gift” at 日本武道館
overview: For her 15th debut anniversary and birthday, Sakamoto Maaya made an amazing concert in Budokan (Tokyo) with a selection of all her best songs! In special guests are Kanno Yoko and Shoko Suzuki!
title: Maaya Sakamoto 15th Anniversary Live "Gift" at Nippon Budokan
